Row.Text: I'm... Ayanami. I am often called the "Demon". I am not afraid of combat. Though just a destroyer, I can fight any enemy...
Would you like to visit our city nearby? The tourist guide is... here.
Let's head there together.
Despite our cities may have very different cultures... I'd like to know more about you and your cities. How is it like in your empire?
Presents from you... I am a bit looking forward to.
Gifts? Uuu... I don't really get it...
My envoys have brought you some presents. I hope you will find them to be... pretty cool. Would you be opened to our... friendliness?
Now, I know that I'm not alone anymore... because I know you'll always be at my side when I needs you.
I don't really want to get any closer...
How should I say this... Um, having you here, is very fun. Therefore, I would like to always stay with you, together.
If you leave me alone like that... I'll be hurt...
I'll follow your steps closely to wherever you go... shall we forge an alliance?
Want to go... to Solomon?
Ayanami's impressions of you? I don't really know... but I don't want to get any close to you... (Denounces You)
I don't particularly... like or dislike combat. I just do what must be done... Ayanami will protect her people.
I'll show you the strength... of Ayanami and her friends! Bear witness to the true power of the "Demon"!
I don't want... to be alone... It's not gonna... end like this!
I feel... motivated when staying with you. You showed me life's purpose extends beyond just fighting and training...
(Your civilization is happy and peaceful)
If Ayanami is being ignored, it will be a little... sad. It is unbefitting to keep a lady waiting...
(Your civilization is aggressive in military and have low happiness)
I don't really get it, but... thanks.
Uuu... It's a bit troublesome.
We have never slack off training... So if the battlefield needs me, I can be ready at any time.
I'm Yuudachi! People call me the "Mad Dog of Solomon"! Heheh, I sound pretty strong, don't I? I'd never lose in a brawl!
Don't just stay inside your cozy room, your bones are gonna rot! Come out and play in our nearest city!
Woof? It's time to play outside!?
Yuudachi's wonderful capital has exquisite meat served day and night! What are the special dishes of your capital city?
*Sniff sniff* I smell meat! Where is it?! Tell me right now!
Hmph! (Yuudachi ignored you)
I've brought you presents! Shigure said I would definitely eat it, so she gave me two pieces to make sure I'd have one left for you. So here's the one left.
Although I don't get complicated things, but one thing I know for sure is I like you the most! Anyone who dares to try messing with you will first have to argue with my cannons!
Emm... did I not hear that right?
Wanna tell the whole world about our friendship? Let's do it!
My sisters will laugh at me for this and it's your fault! What are you gonna do to fix it!?
Let's become allies! It would be awfully nice that way. Plus I'm super reliable!
Grr... I'll stuff you into guns and send you off to space, you damn idiot!
"Shake paws"?! Are you making fun of me?! Grr... Stop treating me like a kid! (Denounces You)
Is it a challenge for me? I won't lose! Awoo! I'm not gonna go easy on you all! Turn to junk floating in the Solomon Sea!
"Grr! Who will I bite today?" How's that? Awfully violent, right? Breaking stuff are my specialty! I'll show you the Nightmare of Solomon!
Ugh, you bastard... Damn it, I can't believe I lost...
Let's go out and have a fight! Just take me out to the battlefield already! I really wanna test out my guns~
(You proved your courage in combat)
It's so boring if not getting to fight... You lack exercise! Stop turtling behind your walls and let's go out to have a duel!
(You dare not waging war against others)
Hurry up and let's check to see if there are any snacks!
Woof?... What?
My main guns are itching for fire! Stand back and withdraw your targets or be prepared!
I'm Shigure, a Shiratsuyu-class destroyer. I don't wanna brag, but I've got the Goddess of Luck watching over me~ Heheh, it's about time people acknowledged luck is part of one's strength.
You're such a lucky one to meet me in this place~ In that case, let me introduce you to our nearest city. Remember to thank me for this!
Then let's hurry up and go get ready~
Luck comes when you least expect it, you know? For example, Shigure just happens to be in the mood of exchanging some cities' information with you.
Fu Fu Fu~ Even without guessing, you should know the great Shigure will welcome them, right?
Heheh~! Well, well, what do you think you're doing? Com-man-der?
Be thankful that you're receiving greetings and gifts from the mighty Shigure! Make sure to sing my praises while you savor it~[NEWLINE]My intentions? Heheh... Have a guess~
Heheh, silly Commander, you can rely on me as much as you want. I'll do anything you want~!
What are you doing? The great Shigure is not as easy to get along with like that dumb Yukikaze!
The gods seem to really love me, so hurry up and shower me with friendship!
Huh? Geez, what are you doing, idiot! Have you not get my invitation?
You just can't be left alone... Worry not, I will stay by your side and take care of you forever~ As long as you accept me as your ally, I'm yours~
I curse you with bad luck! You idiot!
You Stupid fool! Look at me again and I'll bite you! See just how much longer can you live. (Denounces You)
What are you doing?? Haha, interesting, the dummy who knows he will lose yet still begs for a punch in the face. Come and bear the true power of the mighty Shigure!
You don't look too good. How about a torpedo to cheer you up? I am Shigure of Sasebo! Watch closely as I give you a warm welcome, my foolish enemy~
I'm gonna lose? That can't be~! N... Not bad... You'd better remember this!
Heheh, aren't you glad that you get to rely on me more, you lucky idiot of a commander~
(You have established a close relationship with Shigure)
H-hey! Don't you leave me hanging over here! I have always been waiting...
(You are far away from Shigure and didn't send her a delegation)
Mhm, this is a smart decision!
*Tsk*... If it weren't for high rewards then who'd bother with these things...
Let's play a game. I'll give you 15 turns and if you withdraw all your troops from my border then you may have my forgiveness~
Listen up! I'm the noble, lucky, invincible, magni... magnici... the 8th ship of the Kagerou-class, Yukikaze the Great! Ahem! I shall be your lucky star from now on, so be grateful! Wa ha ha!
Do you want to visit out nearest city? Oh by the way, I'll only show you the path and you'll have to manage yourself after that.
A wonderful response. This trip better be worthy of my time!
You'll be amazed by the magnificence of our wondrous capital for what I'm about to tell you. But first, you'll have to let me know about your capital city in advance.
If you beg me like that, the kind Yukikaze'll have to accept it this time.
Hmph! There's no way the elegant and beautiful Yukikaze would just accept the advances of any random person...
You'd better be every grateful to receive the delegation and gifts from Yukikaze the Great herself. Perhaps accepting it will also bestow you with a bit of my luck!
Since you asked so earnestly, Yukikaze the Great shall grant you a favor and allow you to hug her! It's a once in a lifetime opportunity!
Humph~ What a naive thought...
So, have you finally started to admire the greatness of Yukikaze? Well, you have good taste... In that case, offer your pledge of service and I shall accept it.
Hmph!? How dare you turn me down like that! This is punishable by a thousand deaths!
Hmph, have you started thinking about your eternity of servitude to Yukikaze the Great?
What are... you doing... nngh!? Go die!!
Are you dumb? Just look at how naive you are... You are not worthy of the luck of Yukikaze the Great... (Denounces You)
Funyaaaagh! Th-that scared me half to death!! Grrrr... To hell with you!
Yukikaze the Great is here! Losers should hurry up and scram! Witness the true power of Yukikaze the Great! Wa ha ha!
W-wait... wait... please, I know I'm not perfect, but... Huh... You big jerk!!!
Look at that face of yours~ It's only because of me, Yukikaze the Great! If you beg me really hard, I shall happily lend you my aid!
(You are weak in Science and Culture)
Grrrr, even more popular than me... No, no way... But if you think Yukikaze the Great is simply here for fun and games, you'd be dead wrong!
(You are leading in Science and Culture)
Hmph... Yukikaze the Great is only giving you the time of day because she's in a good mood!
Well, are you jealous? Too~ bad~!
Phew... Gazing upon my cities like that, envy them aren't you? It's such a shame they are only loyal to the noble Yukikaze the Great herself!
If it's for everyone, I am willing to become the "Demon"...
Commander, seriously, stop throwing that frisbee at me. I'm not a dog!
Getting pranked by me is a lucky thing on its own, you dunce~
You were only able to return safely because of my luck, so be thankful!
